item.description: Decisions> Decisions # Communication (messages) Authentication and authorization Monitoring (reporting, log and trace) Security Cost management Management and governance Compute Developer tools Databases tools AWS Cloud Foundations> AWS Cloud Foundations # Organization proposed during the conference AWS re:Invent 2022 Implementation> Implementation # Multi-Account Strategy> Multi-Account Strategy # Advantages:
Two accounts. Account A has a resource (ec2) that you want to access with a Lambda Function that is in Account B. But, the resource in A is inside a VPC.
